headline: United States Department of Homeland Security, Office of Inspector General

defaultPosition.companyName: United States Department of Homeland Security
defaultPosition.description: I lead teams responsible for evaluating the effectiveness of TSA, USSS, USCG, CBP, FEMA and ICE security policy and programs.  Each team completes their evaluation within one year and provides findings and recommendations for improvement to the agency, Congress and the American public.
defaultPosition.title: Supervisor for Transportation Security Performance Evaluations

positions.companyName: United States Department of Homeland Security
positions.description: I lead teams responsible for evaluating the effectiveness of TSA, USSS, USCG, CBP, FEMA and ICE security policy and programs.  Each team completes their evaluation within one year and provides findings and recommendations for improvement to the agency, Congress and the American public.
positions.title: Supervisor for Transportation Security Performance Evaluations

positions.description: I led the Evaluation Unit within Peace Corps Office of Inspector General.  The unit was responsible for conducting evaluations of Peace Corps Offices overseas as well as in-depth reviews of headquarter programs including the Volunteer Medical Clearance Process and the Peace Corps' Worldwide Safety and Security Strategy.
positions.title: Assistant Inspector General for Evaluations
